Flub.Name: Save as relative path
Flub.Description: Store the file path relative to the .TOR file rather than the full file path. This is useful when you need to share or transport the file.

Flub.Name: Raw
Flub.Description: Use the height values that the file provides.

Flub.Name: Normalized
Flub.Description: Normalize the height values to Gaea's scale.

Flub.Name: Mapped
Flub.Description: Interpret the incoming data according to the Custom Range values in the Build Tab.

Flub.Name: Adaptive Scaling
Flub.Description: Adaptively resize the file. This is very useful for lower resolution images.

Flub.Name: RGB
Flub.Description: Treat the incoming file as a color image instead of a grayscale heightfield.
